message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.CR, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the problem of optimizing cooperation policies in cognitive radio networks, which involves spectrum sensing, decision-making, and resource allocation. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, such as Information Theory (cs.IT), Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI), Systems and Control (cs.SY), Cryptography and Security (cs.CR), and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). Among these, cs.IT and cs.NI seem to be the most likely categories, as they are directly related to wireless communication and network optimization. The other categories are also relevant, but may be less specific to the problem addressed in the paper.
